means: 加速，催促，赶快( hasten的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He was single-mindedly devoted to the hastening of freedom for the oppressed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一心一意致力于早日让被压迫者获得自由。

sentence.Network_en: It was now obvious that he was hastening to restore the keys to their owner.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在他显然正急着把钥匙归还原主.
许多人匆匆地赶去进餐.

PerfectNetExp.abs: She is a well - known parturition hastening midwife ., 她是这一带有名的催生婆.
Tito stood by her without hastening to reach the book .蒂托站在她身旁，并未急忙地去取书。

list.abs: wiggle中文 ... 绝地学院新 MOD SABER SKILL MOD ... 赶回 hasten back 赶紧办理 hurry on with.
常用动词和常用介词、副词的搭配_在线英语词典 ... hasten sth．to 火速将……送到、调到…… hasten to 赶到…… hear from 接到某 …
大学英语第四册词汇短语强... ... in hasten 急忙的 hasten to 使加速；奔赴；赶到 Blur More 进一步模糊；高效模糊；更模糊；加强柔 …
I hastened to reply ., 我连忙回答.
I hastened to open the sash the past , to make gestures to drive it , it is at the glass head tenaciously flopping about chaos , way .我赶紧过去打开窗扇，做出手势驱赶它，它脑袋冲着玻璃顽强地“扑扑”乱扑腾，玩命的样子。
End check things out , I hasten to exhaustion ., 结束检查事 , 我催促到精疲力尽.

entry.tran: 加速，加快（常指不愉快的事）
entry.def: If you hasten an event or process, often an unpleasant one, you make it happen faster or sooner.

example.ex: But if he does this, he may hasten the collapse of his own country.
example.tran: 但是如果他这样做，就有可能加速自己国家的崩溃。

entry.def: If you hasten to do something, you are quick to do it.

example.ex: She more than anyone had hastened to sign the contract.
example.tran: 她比谁都急着去签了合同。

entry.tran: （为避免他人误会）急忙（补充说）
entry.def: If you hasten to say something, you quickly add something to what you have just said in order to prevent it being misunderstood.

example.ex: Naturally, it'll go back. But without Murray's little note, I hasten to add...
example.tran: 很自然，它会返回。但没有默里的便条，我急忙补充道。

example.ex: 'There's no threat in this, Freddie,' Arnold hastened to say...
example.tran: “这不会有什么危险的，弗雷迪，”阿诺德急忙补充了一句。

entry.def: If you hasten somewhere, you hurry there.

example.ex: One of them, the first to alight, hastened with quicksilver steps towards me.
example.tran: 他们中第一个下来的人急急忙忙地快步向我走来。

sentences.sentence: "to hastening ills a prey"- Oliver Goldsmith

auth_sentence.content: The expansion increases the atmospheric drag on satellites in space, hastening re-entry.
auth_sentence.res_content: The expansion increases the atmospheric drag on satellites in space, hastening re-entry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The expansion increases the atmospheric drag on satellites in space, hastening re-entry.

auth_sentence.content: That soot darkens the surface of the ice and makes it absorb more sunlight, hastening its melt.
auth_sentence.res_content: That soot darkens the surface of the ice and makes it absorb more sunlight, hastening its melt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That soot darkens the surface of the ice and makes it absorb more sunlight, hastening its melt.

auth_sentence.content: I agree that falling natural gas prices have a hand in hastening coal power's demise, but you have to look at the WHOLE picture!
auth_sentence.res_content: I agree that falling natural gas prices have a hand in hastening coal power's demise, but you have to look at the WHOLE picture!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I agree that falling natural gas prices have a hand in hastening coal power's demise, but you have to look at the WHOLE picture!
